member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect
member.summary: Blurs an image in a particular direction. You can use this effect to make an image look as if it is in motion or to emphasize an animated image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Directional blur effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DirectionalBlurEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for DirectionalBlur effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Optimization
member.summary: Level of performance optimization. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.BorderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the border mode for edge pixels. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.BlurAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of blur to be applied to the image. Default value 3.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DirectionalBlurEffect.Angle
member.summary: Angle of the blur relative to the x-axis, in the counterclockwise direction. Units are specified in radians. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.
